"Shower Head thaticates" - A shower head that has built-inication technology that alerts you when your water usage is at risk of exceeding your monthly water bill.
"Shower Head with Voice Commands" - A shower head that allows you to control the water flow, temperature, and pressure with voice commands.
"Smart Shower Head" - A shower head that uses AI technology to learn your preferred water flow, temperature, and pressure settings and automatically adjusts them for you.
"Shower Head with Built-in Music Player" - A shower head that allows you to play your favorite music while you shower.
"Shower Head with LED Lights" - A shower head that has built-in LED lights that change colors and patterns to create a relaxing and enjoyable showering experience.
